description: Try our easy to follow Nutty Broccoli & Cauliflower Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nutty Broccoli & Cauliflower Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the cauliflower mixture to a serving platter. Crumble over the cheese, sprinkle with remaining dukkah, almonds and lemon zest. Serve.
